title: Kasulaperu Inspired Diamond and Emerald Necklace - Traditional Elegance
features: This exquisite necklace draws inspiration from the classic Kasulaperu design, reinterpreted with a modern touch. It features a central floral motif adorned with a vibrant Zambian Emerald and a lustrous South Sea Pearl. The intricate setting is crafted from 22K gold and studded with brilliant-cut diamonds. The delicate floral and leaf patterns showcase exemplary craftsmanship.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
and upscale social events. A statement piece for the modern Telugu bride or a sophisticated addition to any jewelry collection.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The vibrant Zambian Emerald, prized for its rich color, adds a touch of opulence. Expert craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and heirloom quality. The use of natural diamonds and a South Sea pearl elevates its value and prestige. Wear a piece of Telugu heritage with a contemporary flair.
